name: PixNum
description:
This is a puzzle-game like "Mario Pic-cross" on gameboy. You have on the side numbers which give you the amount of the blocks in the field. For example, when there is a "2" and a "3", there is a block with two fields and a block with three fields in this row.

You move the selector with the cursor-keys and with space-bar you set a block. But be carefull, when you hit a field where is no field, then you get a minus of time! With return-key you can mark a field, it is helpful for your thining.
